title: Sound of Sorry // A Social Experiment in Courage
description:
Words hurt and heal. Watch what happens when an ex-girlfriend, bully and a big brother apologize to someone they've hurt in ‘The Sound of Sorry’.
#ItTakesCourage

asset.title: Sound of Sorry // A Social Experiment in Courage
asset.description: Words hurt and heal. Watch what happens when an ex-girlfriend, bully and a big brother apologize to someone they've hurt in ‘The Sound of Sorry’ // Discover more @ http://neverhi.de/7bln // #ItTakesCourage
asset.author: Ray-Ban Films

transcripts:
[Music Playing]
Susie I'm sorry for lying. I'm sorry for hurting you, and for any effects I may have caused.
I'm sorry for being inconsiderate. 
I'm sorry I was so hard on you all the time, You're a pretty amazing guy.
Sorry I lost your trust.
I'm sorry I wasn't there for you mom when you needed me.
